about_the_game:
Tearfallen is a fast paced online action roguelike, set in a world where Gods are corrupt, the system is rigged, and it’s up to you to hack, slash and claw your way to freedom. You are Fallen, thrown into the heart of a shattered pantheon, where the Gods wield their power over a realm on the brink of chaos—but they’re not the only ones with powers, and you’re the wildcard.

Forget honor, forget tradition. This world is yours to tear down and rebuild, and if they don’t like it? Tough luck.

ENDLESS EXPEDITIONS

Throw yourself into Expeditions, where every run offers fierce challenge and little respite. Every room, monster, and boss demands an answer: What are you made of? You’ll find no peace in Death, so grit your teeth, grab your weapon, and fight to win.

BUILD YOUR WAY TO POWER

Grow stronger through each Expedition and unlock the tools you’ll need to stand up against the Origins. Through earning gear from quests, trading it with other Fallen, or just crafting it yourself; create a build that proves you’re a real threat.

NO HERO STANDS ALONE

It’s dangerous to go alone, and destruction is more fun with company. Gather your fellow Fallen, form your party, and bring the forces of Primorden to heel. With your powers combined, you’ll be an unstoppable force that will make even the strongest of Origins tremble.

UNLEASH YOUR POTENTIAL

For Fallen like yourself, there are many ways to gain power. From growing your arsenal of weapons to finding fresh, unique skills on each new Expedition, there’s no single path to victory, only the one you forge yourself.

YOUR WILL AGAINST THE DIVINE

The Origins play their games of power, but who’s to say that’s how the world should be? Claim their power as your own and re-write the rules. Delve into Primorden’s secrets with every monster you slay, and bring about a new age of the Fallen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Rise against the Origins of Primorden! Gather your party and forge your own path in this fast-paced online action roguelike adventure. Feel your power grow through each Expedition as you make your mark on this world and search for the truth of the Fallen. A new Era begins!
